nodes.text: The Triplehorn mountains was a mountain range located on the planet of Alderaan. Its snow-capped peaks bordered the Royal Palace of Aldera, the planet's capital city. At some point before the destruction of Alderaan by the Galactic Empire, the siblings Zak and Tash Arranda hiked to the top of the Triplehorn mountains, which the former described as an exhausting experience.
